casebody.data:
David PATCHAK, petitioner,
v.
Ryan ZINKE, Secretary of the Interior, et al. No. 16-498. Supreme Court of the United States May 1, 2017.

Motion of Federal Courts Scholars for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit granted limited to Question 1 presented by the petition.
